hero.betaTag: Beta program • Live onboarding tour with 18 teams

description.primary: Codexonx unifies your CI/CD lifecycles with an AI assisted pair-authoring flow and secure API key governance.
description.secondary: Ship every sprint with confidence thanks to data-informed reports, shareable retros, and decision logs your teammates can trust.

bullets: Beta access includes two guided weekly onboarding sessions

stats.heading: Platform Snapshot
stats.description: Teams using Codexonx shorten delivery time while keeping quality measurable.

description.lead: A next-generation platform for engineering teams.
description.detail: From planning to ship-ready code, unlock visibility and control throughout your lifecycle.

items.title: Modern Command Center
items.description: Operate streams, integrations, and rollouts from a single customizable dashboard with real-time context.

items.title: Secure API Credentials
items.description: Apply zero-trust policies, instant key rotation, and detailed access logs without leaving your workflow.

items.title: Deep Analytics
items.description: AI-powered reports, trend forecasts, and bespoke metric sets accelerate decision-making for platform leads.

items.title: Enterprise Safeguards
items.description: SOC 2 readiness, encrypted storage, and fine-grained RBAC help you meet global compliance expectations.

trust.heading: Why teams trust Codexonx
trust.description: We iterate transparently with pilot customers and share every milestone.

items.title: GDPR & KVKK aligned
items.description: Process design follows EU and Turkish data protection standards from day one.

items.title: SOC 2 Type I in progress
items.description: Independent audit underway with reports scheduled before Q4 2025.

items.title: Feedback from 18 pilot teams
items.description: Active pilots across Istanbul, Berlin, and London guide our weekly releases.

integrations.heading: Ecosystem & Integrations
integrations.description: Connect every step of your delivery chain. Codexonx observes the journey from commit to live ops.

items.name: GitOps & Repo Sync
items.description: Continuously index GitHub and GitLab repos, auto-review pull requests, and rotate secrets safely.

items.name: Cloud Delivery Flow
items.description: Track Vercel and AWS rollouts with live pipeline health after each deploy.

items.name: Team Notifications
items.description: Share critical events, approvals, and AI summaries instantly through Slack.

testimonials.heading: What our pilot teams say
testimonials.description: Highlights from the teams co-building Codexonx with us.

items.quote: Codexonx gives us confidence by surfacing pipeline health in one place. Our weekly syncs now run on data, not guesswork.
items.name: Selin Arda

items.quote: Even during beta the support team responds within minutes. Key rotation and audit trails removed a huge burden from my crew.
items.name: Jorge Méndez

items.quote: Ahead of our EMEA launch we validated security workflows with Codexonx. The team iterated alongside our actual needs.
items.name: Ebru Kahvecioğlu

pricing.heading: Pricing Plans
pricing.subheading: Scale confidently with plans that include the Codexonx AI editor, secure API management, and workspace sync.

currencyNotes.usd: USD values reference the daily CBRT average rate.
currencyNotes.eur: Euro conversions reflect EU customer guidance.

pricing.currencyDisclaimer: * Exchange rates are indicative and refreshed at billing time.

roi.free: Risk-free for freelancers to explore core workflows at no cost.
roi.enterprise: We tailor pricing and SLAs around your deployment footprint and governance requirements.
roi.team: Roughly {{formattedCost}} monthly for a {{teamSize}}-person squad. Teams save ~8 engineering hours per sprint on average.

starter.name: Starter
starter.tagline: An ideal launchpad for individual builders.

pro.name: Pro
pro.tagline: Automation and insights for growing squads.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.tagline: Advanced security, dedicated SLAs, and on-prem options.

faq.question: Is the Starter plan truly free?
faq.answer: Yes. No credit card required and you stay on Starter unless you decide to upgrade.

faq.question: Who benefits most from the Pro plan?
faq.answer: Product and platform teams shipping daily. It includes automated rotation, 30-day logs, and priority support.

faq.question: How do Enterprise engagements work?
faq.answer: Pricing reflects the number of environments, compliance scope, and enablement needs. Most teams launch in 4-6 weeks.

cta.title: Accelerate your team's AI-assisted workflows
cta.description: Codexonx brings secure workspace orchestration, automated pipeline observability, and AI-guided pair authoring so you can ship faster.

footer.description: Future-proof your teams with secure pipeline management, workspace synchronization, and AI-guided code generation.
footer.tagline: Istanbul • Built for global product squads
